name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-peopledetails
title: People Details
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension shows general CRUD operations for people details using SharePoint list and Adaptive Card which involves multiple QuickViews and pnp js
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension shows general CRUD operations for people details using SharePoint list and Adaptive Card which involves multiple QuickViews and pnp js.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
